definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Suitable conditions of stripping palladium with ammonium chloride-(ammonia) solution are also studied.
sentences.chinese: 也考察了氯化銨的氨水溶液反萃取鈀的適宜條件。

sentences.english: Ammonium chloride vaporizes on heating, and sublimes back to a solid on cooling.
sentences.chinese: 氯化銨受熱蒸發，昇華，冷卻還原爲固體。

sentences.english: The extent of coprecipitation of copper with ferric hydroxide in the ammonium chloride-ammonia process has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 用氫氧化銨及氯化銨以分離銅與鐵，結果很好。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of low-dose ammonium chloride on learning and memory in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察小劑量氯化銨對小鼠學習記憶功能的影響。
